references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs) which underly the methods discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced diffusion models by enabling the generation of high-resolution images, a crucial improvement that is directly relevant to the acceleration techniques explored in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This work extended diffusion models to video generation, providing a more complex application scenario where the acceleration techniques in the target paper are especially beneficial.

references.paper_title: Distrifusion: Distributed parallel inference for high-resolution diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is a direct competitor to the target paper, also focusing on distributed parallel acceleration of diffusion models, providing a relevant comparison and context for the advancements in the target paper.

references.paper_title: DPM-Solver: A fast ODE solver for diffusion probabilistic model sampling in around 10 steps
references.reason: This paper provides a key advancement in diffusion model sampling efficiency, influencing the design choices and overall context of the target paper’s improvements.
